description:

Kamala’s leadership has been lacking, to say the very least. She cannot lead America into anything but chaos and destruction. And given this painfully obvious fact, JD Vance presented the most perfect example that is representative of Kamala’s de facto first term.

Make Six Packs Great Again.

Vote for Donald J. Trump🇺🇸 pic.twitter.com/cXGP7T5H6y
— JD Vance (@JDVance)
title: JD Vance makes the PERFECT closing argument to vote Trump, and it involves beer

description:
With less than 24 hours until election day, Trump released his most inspirational and best ads yet.

The closing ad from Donald Trump is epic and brilliant. pic.twitter.com/s8CDd77Sm0
— Matt Margolis (@mattmargolis) November 4, 2024

You cannot sum up this movement better than that.

Now compare that with one of Kamala’s latest attempts to appeal to undecided voters.

I believe in the promise of America. pic.twitter.com/1E
title: Watch: Trump releases his BRILLIANT closing argument ad

description:
Kamala hates transparency so much that she would rather mock you at the ballot box. She couldn’t care less about proving how she stands on any of the issues, as she would rather climb the political ladder than respect you enough to be the least bit transparent.

Along California’s progressive pursuit to chaos, the Golden State de facto legalized theft. It just so happens that Kamala was the attorney general at that time. However, given that the effects of this are so bad and dangerous, voters will now decide if Proposition 36 passes, which would increase penalties for certain drug and theft crimes. It’s unclear if Kamala voted for more of the same in California but given that she refuses to answer that proves what you al
title: Kamala Cowardly Refuses To Answer How She Voted On Major Ballot Initiative With This Lame Excuse

description:
The worst part about many Democratic politicians is that they pretend to be all in for the little guy while claiming to tax the rich into oblivion. However, the only problem with that is that many of them are so out of touch with the regular person that they cannot physically comprehend what it means to worry about the price of gas. Additionally, it’s pathetic that they claim they will tax themselves, as many politicians who despise the rich are richer than the majority of Americans could ever imagine.

All of that is even more irritating because these politicians are never called out for their blatant hypocrisy and lies…. Until now.

"We cannot afford to engage in endless wars. And your husband Jake Sullivan... has caused the world on fire because he is incompetent
title: GOP Candidate Has Epic Take Down Of Out-Of-Touch Millionaire Pretending To Fight For Americans

description:
It's not about a squirrel. It was never about a squirrel.

I'd never heard of Peanut the Squirrel before this weekend. I don't spend much of my time doom scrolling on Instagram.

I prefer to do it on X.

But don't think I didn't jump onto Grok to immediately exploit the situation with AI.
title: The Squirrel Heard 'Round the World

description:
ONE DAY to Election 2024 | Get ready for the Election Livestream of the Century: The Rumble on Rumble, November 5th at 6PM ET.

We will simul-stream with Dan Bongino, Piers Morgan, Russell Brand, Patrick Bet-David, Tim Pool, and other high-profile guests!

We will remain live until the election is called, potentially lasting days or weeks.

We will feature a cutting-edge crowdsourced Election Integrity Map, using real-time qualitative data vetted and verified live by in-house journalist-moderators. The Election Integrity Map will display live video and photographic reports submitted by citizen journalists, highlighting election anomalies coast to
title: We are the News Now: Election 2024 Docuseries Part 3
